DC CODE ยง 29-106.04

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: If the Mayor denies a domestic filing entity's application for reinstatement following administrative dissolution, the Mayor shall serve the entity pursuant to ยง 29-104.12 with a notice in a record that explains the reason or reasons for denial.
An entity may seek judicial review of denial of reinstatement in the Superior Court not later than 30 days after service of the notice of denial.

heading.catch_text: Judicial review of denial of reinstatement.
